physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a woman and a dog. The woman has placed the dog on her laps and is holding it. The dog is looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured, while the lady is looking at the dog. The lady wears a dress with a headdress.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows Charlotte Adelheid Vosmarr with a dog on her lap.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of Charlotte Adelheid Vosmarr with a dog
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Women Dogs Portrait photography
